div.p: In the event of inclement weather, please tune in to the following radio and television stations for school closing information.

p.span:
In addition, the School District will utilize the voicemail/email Skylert system to inform parents of closings, delays, or early releases.
School Closing Information will be posted on the school website and district Facebook account: Waterloo WI School District.
Please do not call the school offices for school closing information.

div.div: 813 N. Monroe Street, Waterloo, WI 53594 | Phone 920-478-3633 | Fax 920-478-3821
